SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.players

Interface PlayerModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
Player
public interface PlayerModel
Interface to give external classes access to Player-type objects. It contains all the methods a player is supposed to show to the outside.

  • Method Details

    • getUsername

      String getUsername()
      Returns:
      The player's username.

    • getPlayerColor

      PlayerColor getPlayerColor()
      Returns:
      The player's in-game color

    • getTotalPoints

      int getTotalPoints()
      Returns:
      The total points the player got at the end of the game, after evaluating their completion of the objectives

    • getGamePoints

      int getGamePoints()
      Returns:
      The player's points gathered by placing cards on the board

    • getObjectivePoints

      int getObjectivePoints()
      Returns:
      The player's points gathered by fulfilling conditions on their personal objective and the common objectives of the game

    • getPlayArea

      PlayAreaModel getPlayArea()
      Returns:
      The player's board state, giving access only to its non-modifier methods

    • getHand

      HandModel getHand()
      Returns:
      The player's hand, giving access only to its non-modifier methods

    • getPersonalObjective

      ObjectiveCard getPersonalObjective()
      Returns:
      The player's personal objective, or null if the player has yet to choose their objective.

    • getPersonalObjectiveOptions

      List<ObjectiveCard> getPersonalObjectiveOptions()
      Returns:
      The player's two objective cards from which they'll choose their personal objective

    • getStarterCard

      StarterCard getStarterCard()
      Returns:
      The player's starter card, regardless of whether they have already chosen the side to use.

    • getChoseStarterCardSide

      boolean getChoseStarterCardSide()
      Returns:
      whether the player has chosen which side of their starter card to display

    • getChosePersonalObjective

      boolean getChosePersonalObjective()
      Returns:
      which of the two given possible personal objectives the player chose

    • getChoseColor

      boolean getChoseColor()
      Returns:
      whether the player has already chosen their color.

    • getChat

      ChatModel getChat()
      Returns:
      The player's ChatModel interface, used to interact with the lobby chat.

    • isConnected

      boolean isConnected()
      Returns:
      whether the player is connected.

    • setConnected

      void setConnected(boolean isConnected)
      Parameters:
      isConnected - Whether the player is connected or not.

    • isDeadlocked

      boolean isDeadlocked()
      Returns:
      Whether the player is deadlocked.
